page.title: 10COMMERCIAL SQUARE
page.content: COMMERCIAL SQUARE COMMERCIAL SQUARE IS THE COMMERCIAL CENTRE OF HAYWARDS HEATH.THE BUSY RAILWAY STATION IS SITUATED NEARBY AND FORMS PART OF THE MAIN LONDON TO BRIGHTON LINE.A NUMBER OF HOUSES AND SHOPS SURROUND THE SQUARE.THE BUSY SQUARE SERVES A NUMBER OF THE TOWNS ESSENTIAL SERVICES;_SOUTHERN GAS OFFICES, THE LOCAL FIRE STATION AND THE BRITISH TELECOM YARD. THE FIRE STATION SERVES ALL OF THE TOWN AND THE SURROUNDING VILLAGES. THE APPLIANCES CONSIST OF TWO HEAVY DUTY PUMPS, A LAND ROVER EQUIPPED FOR FOREST FIRES AND A MOBILE COMMUNICATIONS UNIT. THE STATION ALSO HOUSES THE WEST SUSSEX FIRE PREVENTION OFFICE. THE SOUTHERN GAS COMPANY PREMISES ARE MAINLY OFFICES AND WORK SHOPS.
